page.title: 15Verulamium park St.Albans.
page.content: The British Wildlife zoo closed.It was not popular.The{Herts/Middx trust {for Nature conservation}is now there, in an old timber framed house,saved and rebuilt from Watford.They have 50000 visitors each year.The{120 acre {park}has about{3000 trees}and there are{1000 wildfowl}on the lakes.No boating or swimming are allowed. It has{10 tennis}and{4 netball courts {8 soccer,4 hockey}and{5 cricket {pitches}as well as a childrens{play- {ground}and a {paddling pool,}used by about 25000 children each year.So the park is used for local recreation as well as{tourism.}It also has{carnival and{fairground}sites and all kinds of leisure{events,}from sponsored walks to "Its a{Knockout".Competitions}take place here.With grass,water and wooded areas, it is a favourite{picnic place} and has lovely views of the Abbey.
